caption.p: Molecular modelling on H 5 with BG-azides. (A) RMSD of the atomic positions for the compound BGN3 (Lig fit Prot, in red) and the protein H 5 (Cα positions, in blue) of the 100 ns molecular dynamics simulations using Desmond package. (B) A timeline representation of the interactions and contacts (H-bonds, Hydrophobic, Ionic, Water bridges). (C) RMSD of the atomic positions for the compound BGSN3 (Lig fit Prot, in red) and the protein H 5 (Cα positions, in blue) of the 100 ns molecular dynamics simulations using Desmond package. (D) A timeline representation of the interactions and contacts (H-bonds, Hydrophobic, Ionic, Water bridges). (E) Solvent Accessible Surface Area (SASA) of BGN3/ H 5 ( in orange) and BGSN3/ H 5 ( in cyan) complexes over the MD simulation time (mean values are depicted as dot lines). Frames of H 5 -probe complexes with lower (F, H) and higher (G, I) SASA value for BGN3 (F, G) and BGSN3 (H, I), respectively.
